bio.paragraph: Hey, I'm Loisa! I'm a software developer located in Nairobi, Kenya. Welcome to my spot on the web for my projects, tutorials, art, musings, and anything else I want to show the world.
Check out the projects page to see a highlight of my open-source work, and the blog for my tutorials and more.
My site has no ads, no affiliate links, no tracking or analytics, no sponsored posts, and no paywall. My only motivation for this site is to share what I've learned with the world.
I want to make the internet a better place. Even if it's just right here. I hope I will inspire others to make their own creative corner on the web as well.
You can contact me by email at hello at kitakayaloisa@gamil.com to say hi! I always appreciate meeting new people.

what_im_doing_now.content: Just like most developers, I have recently been blown away by OpenAI and the technologies they have brought to tech scene. This has led me to explore their API (which is open to the public). That being said I am currently working on a toolkit that is powered by AI that will assist developers in their work. Btw, if you are reading this and want to collab on a project, let me know.

random_facts.fact: I built my first website in 2016
I like animated films and anime such as The DOTA's Dragon's Blood, Archer, and Code Geass
I have a soft sport for old video games such as Shrek 2, FIFA 2007, 25 to life
I also like strategy games and competitive MOBAs ðŸŽ®
